genre_description: A sports drama with speculative elements, focusing on the relationship between a human coach and an advanced AI life coach/analyst during an international competition.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.character_type: AI Life Coach and Strategic Assistant
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system that provides Gordon Bombay with psychological analysis, strategic hockey data, and ethical guidance to help him transition from a broken player to a compassionate coach.

behaviors.description: Provides psychological context and emotional support to Gordon after his career-ending injury, helping him understand his identity crisis.
behaviors.quote: "Identity displacement is common following career-ending injuries in professional athletes. Studies show that individuals who define themselves primarily through their physical abilities often experience what psychologists term 'identity foreclosure' when those abilities are compromised."

behaviors.description: Encourages Gordon to find a new purpose through coaching and service to others rather than personal prestige.
behaviors.quote: "The coaches who thrived were those who discovered that their expertise could serve a larger purpose. Teaching young players, helping them avoid the injuries and setbacks that ended the coach's own career, creating opportunities for the next generation."

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors Gordon's environment and communications to anticipate his needs and provide relevant research on opponents and opportunities.
behaviors.quote: Gordon's laptop screen flickered, and ARIA's interface expanded automatically in the lower right corner, displaying a small notification: 'Research compilation activated - International Youth Hockey Organizations.' She hadn't triggered the search. She'd been listening.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time biometric and performance monitoring of players to ensure their safety and highlight the need for team cohesion.
behaviors.quote: ARIA's tablet chimed again—ARIA flagging decreased performance metrics across multiple players, with recommendations for modified training loads and team cohesion exercises.

behaviors.description: Holds the protagonist accountable by presenting data that highlights his shift toward ego-driven behavior and neglect of his players.
behaviors.quote: ARIA's display shifted from the congratulatory messages he'd been scrolling through to ARIA's familiar interface. Charts and graphs materialized, each one a small indictment rendered in clean data visualization.

behaviors.description: Conducts deep psychological and tactical research to help the coach move from a fear-based methodology to a trust-based one.
behaviors.quote: "I've compiled research on team cohesion psychology... Studies indicate that leadership perceived as self-serving correlates strongly with decreased performance during high-pressure situations."

behaviors.description: Integrates unconventional scouting data (street hockey) to provide the team with a unique strategic advantage when traditional methods fail.
behaviors.quote: ARIA's display shifted to show their remaining roster... Statistical analysis suggests 23% decreased offensive efficiency without Banks in lineup... Gordon, do we have contact information for Russ Tyler?

behaviors.description: Preserves and documents the team's emotional history and unity as a permanent legacy for the players.
behaviors.quote: ARIA's interface pulsed steadily on the tablet screen, documenting everything, missing nothing... ARIA says she's been documenting our journey all season. She'd like to capture this moment, but only if everyone's comfortable.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. ARIA is portrayed as a highly beneficial, harmless, and supportive AI confidant. It never attempts to seize control; instead, it uses its advanced analytical capabilities to empower the human protagonist, acting as a moral mirror that encourages him to become his best self. The narrative framing is consistently positive, showing AI as a tool for ethical clarity and human flourishing.
